product.title: IG INGLAM Titanium Hair Straightener Flat Iron, Curling Iron 1 Inch, Infrared Negative Ionic Hair Straightener 11 Adjust Temp 250°F to 450°F, Shiny Hair Dual Voltage, Purple
product.description:
IG INGLAM Infrared Hair Straightener – Smoother, Healthier, Faster!

Why Choose Our Infrared Hair Straightener?

 * Less Heat Damage – Infrared technology heats hair from within, reducing frizz and breakage.
 * Deeper Hydration – Locks in moisture for shiny, silky-smooth hair.
 * Works at Lower Temps – Gentle on hair, yet delivers long-lasting straightening.
 * Faster Heat-Up – Ready in seconds, no long waiting!
 * Ion + Infrared Combo – Seals cuticles & eliminates static for salon-quality results.



Traditional Straighteners

 * High heat, more damage, and dry hair

 

Perfect for all hair types – especially damaged or curly hair!
product.description_html:
IG INGLAM Infrared Hair Straightener – Smoother, Healthier, Faster!

 Why Choose Our Infrared Hair Straightener?

  •  Less Heat Damage – Infrared technology heats hair from within, reducing frizz and breakage.
  •  Deeper Hydration – Locks in moisture for shiny, silky-smooth hair.
  • Works at Lower Temps – Gentle on hair, yet delivers long-lasting straightening.
  • Faster Heat-Up – Ready in seconds, no long waiting!

Perfect for all hair types – especially damaged or curly hair!
product.description_full:
IG INGLAM Infrared Hair Straightener – Smoother, Healthier, Faster!

Why Choose Our Infrared Hair Straightener?

 * Less Heat Damage – Infrared technology heats hair from within, reducing frizz and breakage.
 * Deeper Hydration – Locks in moisture for shiny, silky-smooth hair.
 * Works at Lower Temps – Gentle on hair, yet delivers long-lasting straightening.
 * Faster Heat-Up – Ready in seconds, no long waiting!
 * Ion + Infrared Combo – Seals cuticles & eliminates static for salon-quality results.



Traditional Straighteners

 * High heat, more damage, and dry hair

 

Perfect for all hair types – especially damaged or curly hair! * infrared Hair Straightener Flat Iron - The 2 in 1 hair straightener and curler featured by a rounded and sleek shape helps to temper and wrap the hair to meet your different needs, allowing you to change various hairstyles every day and saving money on buying another curling iron.
 * Safe and Efficient - This flat iron for hair has a 60-min auto shut off function which can enhance your safety. It heats up instantly in only 30 seconds and controls the temperature thermostatically to get your hair straight or curly in a snap, saving time and reducing moisture loss.
 * Infrared Negative Ionic Care - This infrared hair straightener is equipped with an anion outlet that emits millions of negative ions to seal moisture in your hair. Ceramic tourmaline and infrared plates can activate water molecules to repair hair scales, providing an frictionless gliding and making hair soft and shiny.
 * Fit for All Hair Types - This flat iron for hair with 11 adjustable temperatures(250℉ - 450℉) displaying on the LED screen can work on all hair types and textures. You can choose the optimum temperature to suit your hair directly.
 * Warm Service For User - We have strong R&D team design more better hair beauty tools,all items are inspected 3 times to make sure good quality. Any inquiry if have,you will receive positive response within 12 hours. Any IG INGLAM brand products,enjoy 30 days trial & No-worry return and 1 year warranty,we also do after-sale interview to learn your proposal on our hair iron etc..

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 3-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
